All Classes

  • Class Description
    AggressiveStrategy
    This Class is for Aggressive Strategy for player Behavior An aggressive computer player strategy that focuses on attack (reinforces its strongest country, then always attack with it until it cannot attack anymore, then fortifies in order to maximize aggregation of forces in one country).
    AllTests
    This is test suite class for running all the test cases.
    BenevolentStrategy
    This class will implement Benevolent player strategy
    CardExchangeView
    This class gives the information about the cards owned by the player
    CheaterStrategy
    This Class implements the Strategy Pattern for Cheater behaviour
    CommandLine
    This class gives the command line interface for user Every user input is retrieved and navigated to functionality
    CommonController
    This class contains the common methods which can be used in multiple controllers
    ConquestReadWrite
    This class contains conquest read write attributes
    CONSTANTS
    Class is used to provide Constant Variable used in project
    Continents
    This class contains the Continents information
    Countries
    This class contains countries information
    DominationReadWrite
    This class contains read/wirte methods for domination files
    GameMap
    This class contains the map attributes
    GameState
    This class contains the game state attributes
    GameStateBuilder
    This class contains the game state builder attributes
    GameStateScenario
    This class contains the game state scenario attributes
    LoadGame
    This class contains the Main class
    MapFileAdapter
    This class implements an adapter to adapt a conquest file to a domination file format
    MapFormatValidation
    This class contains Map validation information
    MapSelectionController
    All the map operations are performed in this controller
    Observable  
    Observer  
    PhaseView
    This class gives the the information about the game state, current player and actions performed
    Player
    This model contains the properties of the players
    PlayerController
    This class contains all the methods for reinforcement, attack and fortification
    PlayerSelectionController
    This class performs all operation regarding players
    PlayersList
    This class contains the player list
    PlayerWorldDominationView
    This class gives the information about player statistics
    RandomStrategy
    This Class is for Random Strategy for player Behavior
    Strategy
    This is the strategy interface which contains execute method
    StrategyController
    This class contains all the methods for set Strategy and execute behaviour of Strategy
    SuiteGamePlayOperations
    this test suit is for all game play operation cases
    SuiteStartUpOperations
    this test suit is for all game play operation cases
    SuiteTournamentOperations  
    TestCommonMethods
    test cases for common methods
    TestMapOperations
    This class is used for testing map methods
    TestPlayerAttack
    This class is used for testing attack methods.
    TestPlayerFortification
    This class is used for testing fortification methods
    TestPlayerOperations
    This class is used for testing the player methods
    TestPlayerReinforcement
    This class is used for testing the reinforcement methods
    TestTournament
    This class is used for testing the tournament mode operations
    Tournament
    This class contains the tournament details
    WelcomeScreen
    This class is the first class to take input from user to proceed to commandline
